entity.name: Pollinations.AI
entity.description: Pollinations.AI is the most easy-to-use, free image generation API available. No signups or API keys required. Embed like any normal image. Our platform serves over 50,000 active users and generates more than 8 million images per month. We integrate with various open-source LLMs, bots, and communities, offering a free and open-source API that users can also self-host.

projects.name: Pollinations.AI
projects.description: An open-source platform for generative AI, focusing on image generation. Our platform serves over 50,000 active users and generates more than 8 million images per month. We integrate with various open-source LLMs, bots, and communities, offering a free and open-source API that users can also self-host.

channels.description: Please contact us for bank transfer details.
Support us by buying a coffee!

plans.name: Infrastructure Support
plans.description: Help cover our server and GPU infrastructure costs to keep Pollinations.AI free and accessible. Our monthly GPU costs are approximately $3000.

plans.name: Developer Fund
plans.description: Support our team in continuing to develop and improve Pollinations.AI. Our monthly developer costs are approximately $4000.

plans.name: Open Source Contribution
plans.description: Contribute any amount to support our open-source development efforts and help maintain our free, self-hostable API.
